OK, with your encouragement, I have disassembled my sword, taken pictures a=
nd posted them in my folder "Becky's Sword".  They are the last 5 pictures =
in the folder.  If the sword blade is signed it appears to be with a single=
 character that looks something like a Y.  It isn't very clear and the pict=
ures aren't very good, but if anyone can tell anything, I'd sure like to kn=
ow it.
   
  Thanks,
   
  Becky
